type: Tutorial Step - Quick Refresher on Stages!

definition.text: Notice that not all nodes are evaluated all the time! Only those in the active stage are!

paragraphs.text: This is a quick refresher on strategy stages! If you haven't read the docs on trading systems and strategies, then find the time and do it!
Notice how these conditions are not highlighted for the candles within the position.
This is because you are looking at the Trigger Stage definitions. These definitions are evaluated until a Strategy is triggered. Once triggered, the Open Stage kicks in, and so on!
